text: |Site information|Details| ||| |Address|Durward Street/Brady Street/Vallance Road| |Area [ha]|5.37| |Ward|Spitalfields and Banglatown| |PTAL [2031]|6a-6b| |Planning designations|z Area of substandard air quality z Town Centre (Whitechapel District Centre) z Local Employment Location z Archaeological Priority Area (Whitechapel, tier 2; and London to Colchester Roman Road, tier 2) z Conservation Area (Whitechapel Market; London Hospital and Myrdle Street, both adjacent to site) z Statutory Listed Buildings (261-267 Whitechapel Road, Grade II; K2 Telephone Kiosk, Grade II; Kind Edward VII Jewish Memorial Drinking Fountain, Grade II; Parish Boundary Marker, Grade II; Albion Brewery Entrance Block, Grade II, adjacent to site; and numerous other Grade II listed assets adjacent to the site)| |Relevant Permissions|None| 410 Tower Hamlets Local Plan BACK TO CONTENTS
